Property Management
Software for Student Housing

Track multi-occupant leases, file property inspections, and track maintenance all from one place.

Execute leases and receive payments from students in advance of their move-in date

Collect eSignatures for every lease and addendum right from within Buildium’s property management software. Receive payment on first month’s rent and security deposits easily from out-of-state students via the resident portal.

Text Every Residents

Quickly remind residents of the trash policy, rent due date, or maintenance policy by sending them a text message.

File inspection reports in the field

Overwhelmed with inspections on August 31? Just download our mobile inspections app to create a custom template. Once the inspection is complete all of your data will sync to your Buildium account automatically.

Track maintenance trends and tasks

Never let another broken faucet or wall-hole go unnoticed again. Students and employees can submit maintenance requests online, and attach videos and photos. Assign them to vendors and get status updates until the item is closed.

Start your free trial today

With a 14-day free trial and customized customer onboarding, you have everything to gain.
